metadata.title: CVE-2016-10190 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in libavformat/http.c in FFmpeg before 2.8.10,3.0.x before 3.0.5, 3.1.x before 3.1.6, and 3.2.x before 3.2.2 allowsremote web servers to execute arbitrary code via a negative chunk size inan HTTP response.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
